Description: Base backend setup, CI, shared middleware, and observability baseline.
Acceptance Criteria: CI passes; request IDs in logs; service health endpoint available

Description: Interpret + confirm flow for safe assistant actions.
Acceptance Criteria: Interpret and confirm endpoints function with deterministic response schema

Description: Task create/read/update/delete with reminders and audit.
Acceptance Criteria: Task lifecycle APIs pass acceptance tests; reminders and audits are present

Description: Provider 1 OAuth and event mutation flow.
Acceptance Criteria: Provider 1 connect + event CRUD stable in staging

Description: SLOs, alerts, runbooks, release checks.
Acceptance Criteria: Alerting and runbook validated; release checklist complete

Summary: Initialize backend repo and CI pipeline
Description: Create service repo/module layout, lint/test pipeline, and build job.
Acceptance Criteria: Main branch build green; lint/test jobs configured

Description: Add bearer token validation and user context propagation.
Acceptance Criteria: Unauthorized requests rejected; user ID available in handlers

Summary: Add request correlation IDs and structured logging
Description: Inject request ID in middleware and include in all logs.
Acceptance Criteria: All API logs include request_id and endpoint

Summary: Create Task and ActionAudit DB migrations
Description: Add initial Task and ActionAudit tables with required indexes.
Acceptance Criteria: Migrations run cleanly; indexes present for key query paths

Description: Implement minimal intent parse and entity extraction response contract.
Acceptance Criteria: Endpoint returns intent/entities/confirmation requirement

Description: Implement confirmation decision endpoint and execution trigger.
Acceptance Criteria: Confirm executes action; cancel performs no mutation

Description: Create task endpoint with idempotency key support.
Acceptance Criteria: Duplicate idempotency key does not create duplicate task

Summary: Write ActionAudit hook for task create
Description: Persist success/failure audit for confirmed task actions.
Acceptance Criteria: Audit row created on success and failure paths

Summary: Reminder queue producer for task create
Description: Publish reminder job event after task creation.
Acceptance Criteria: Reminder job enqueued with due/reminder timestamps

Summary: Mobile shell: voice/text capture + confirm UI
Description: Implement basic mobile capture and confirmation interaction.
Acceptance Criteria: User can submit utterance and confirm/cancel action

Description: Return tasks with filters (status, due range, pagination).
Acceptance Criteria: Filtered task list returned with stable pagination

Description: Update task fields: title/status/priority/due/reminder/tags.
Acceptance Criteria: Allowed fields update correctly and are audited

Description: Soft-delete or cancel task with audit trail.
Acceptance Criteria: Task removed from active list and audit event recorded

Description: Start/callback/disconnect flow for calendar provider 1.
Acceptance Criteria: User can connect and disconnect provider successfully

Description: Create calendar event with confirmation path.
Acceptance Criteria: Event created in provider and stored locally

Description: Update/move calendar event with concurrency checks.
Acceptance Criteria: Event updates succeed; conflict errors handled

Description: Cancel/delete event mapping to provider behavior.
Acceptance Criteria: Event cancellation reflected locally and remotely

Summary: Queue worker retry/backoff and dead-letter baseline
Description: Add retry policy and dead-letter queue behavior for provider operations.
Acceptance Criteria: Transient errors retry with backoff; permanent failures dead-letter

Description: Execute reminder jobs and track delivered/failed state.
Acceptance Criteria: Reminder status persisted for monitoring

Description: Return daily plan combining tasks + events.
Acceptance Criteria: Daily plan ordered by time/priority with clear summary

Description: Return action history timeline with filters.
Acceptance Criteria: History endpoint returns assistant/user action timeline

Summary: Integrate token vault and secret handling
Description: Move provider tokens to vault and enforce access policies.
Acceptance Criteria: No provider token stored plaintext in app DB

Summary: Implement log redaction and retention settings
Description: Apply redaction rules and retention policy configs.
Acceptance Criteria: Sensitive fields redacted; retention config active

Description: Create latency/error/success/queue-depth dashboards and alert thresholds.
Acceptance Criteria: Dashboards live; alerts fire correctly in test

Summary: On-call runbook and incident response checklist
Description: Document top failure scenarios and mitigation steps.
Acceptance Criteria: Runbook reviewed and used in tabletop exercise

Summary: End-to-end staging test and go/no-go review
Description: Execute P0 acceptance tests and release decision meeting.
Acceptance Criteria: P0 tests pass; no open critical defects; release decision logged
